name: R4_v3_RoleCode_for_R5
title: Cross-version VS for R4.v3.RoleCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-RoleCode|2018-08-12 for use in FHIR R5. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R4 to R5.
